articles.title: Alex Bregman shares his advice for younger Red Sox teammates down the stretch
articles.description:
"You could start swinging harder, trying to do more ... Sometimes less is more."

The post Alex Bregman shares his advice for younger Red Sox teammates down the stretch appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Alex Bregman advises younger Red Sox players to focus on consistency over effort.
Bregman emphasizes that 'less is more' as the team approaches the playoffs.
This guidance aims to enhance team performance for Boston residents' playoff hopes.

articles.title: 3 takeaways from the Revolution’s 1-1 draw vs. Toronto FC
articles.description:
"There have been too many of those games this year where we're right there to win — especially at home — we've got to go and win it."

The post 3 takeaways from the Revolution’s 1-1 draw vs. Toronto FC appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Revolution secured a 1-1 draw against Toronto FC on September 13, 2025.
This marks another missed opportunity for the Revolution to win at home.
Fans express frustration over the team's inability to convert close matches into victories.

articles.title: Max Fried helps the Yankees beat the Red Sox 5-3 to strengthen playoff position
articles.description:
Fried pitched 5 1/3 innings and Jazz Chisholm Jr. recorded three RBIs for the Yankees.

The post Max Fried helps the Yankees beat the Red Sox 5-3 to strengthen playoff position appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Yankees defeated Red Sox 5-3 on September 13, impacting Boston's playoff chances.
Max Fried pitched 5 1/3 innings, contributing to the Yankees' victory.
Jazz Chisholm Jr. recorded three RBIs, highlighting the Yankees' offensive strength.
